chapter.text: kontent womb! Ne anim kon ki vol okaz gxi morgaux ne 1 kon which land li sxi mort! DI est Omniscient Cognizant . . [32:1] A. L. M
Libr est dub revelation Lord univers
Ili dir Li fabricated gxi. Ja this est truth your Lord avert popol who neniam ricev warner vi ili direkt
DI EST UNU KRE heavens TER CXIO them 6 TAG TIAM assumed all AUXTORITAT. Vi hav neniom Him as Lord nor do vi hav intercessor! Vi ne pren heed
All materi controlled Him heaven ter! Al Him tag est ekvivalent al 1000 de your jar
Knower de all sekret declarations; Almighty Merciful
Li est Unu perfekt cxio Li kre started creation human el clay
Tiam Li ad his reproduction nepr lowly liquid
Li shaped him blov him His spirit Li don vi auxd eyesight cerb; rarely est vi thankful
Ili wonder Post ni vanish ter do ni kre re? Do as regards meeting their Lord ili est disbelievers
Dir Vi put death angxel whose charge vi ej tiam your Lord vi returned
Nur vi seg kulp when ili bow their kap their Lord Our Lord tuj ni seg ni auxd. send us ni est righteous! Nun ni ating certainty
Hav ni willed ni don cxiu anim its guidance gxi jam predetermined mi fill Infer jinns humans all together
Gust consequences de your forges this tag; tuj ni forges vi. Vi incurred etern retribution dors your own works
Nur popol ver kred en our revelations est those fal prostrate upon auxd them! Ili glor lauxd their Lord any arrogance
Their flank readily forsake their bed en ord worship their Lord reverence kaj esper kaj our provisions them ili don
Vi ne hav ide kiel mult joy happiness waiting vi as rekompenc your (righteous) works
Unu est believer sam as unu est est wicked? Ili est egal
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ind etern Paradise! Such est their abode dors their works
As por wicked their destiny est Infer. Cxiu temp ili pen las gxi ili forced dors! Ili told Gust agondi Infer vi uz disbelieve en
(Ni let them gust smaller retribution this mond) antaux ili incur greater retribution Hereafter ke ili (pren hint reform)
Who evil than unu est reminded de these revelations his Lord tiam insist disregarding them? Ni certainly pun kulp
Ni don Moses scripture - Ne haven any dub meeting Him! - Ni far gxi direkt Infan Israel
Ni appointed them imams direkt en accordance kun our commandments ili steadfastly persevered ating certainty our revelations
Your Lord est Unu jugx them Tag Resurrection cxio ili disput
Gxi Does ever occur them kiel many generaci ni annihilated them? Ili tuj viv marsx en their ancestors' hejm. This proviz sufficient proofs Ili ne auxd
Ili ne realize ni driv akv barren land, produkt gxi crops feed their livestock tro themselves? Ili ne seg
Ili challenge Kie ke victory vi est est truthful
Dir tag such victory ven kred vol ne benefit those ne kred antaux ke, nor vol ili don another sxanc
Do disregard them wait ili tro waiting
